settings.title: Picking the Perfect Piggy Products
settings.content: Our gorgeous guinea pigs love lots of room to zoom, cosy snuggle spots, and the right diet. We’ve got everything you need for happy, healthy pigs for you.
settings.button_text: Take me to the Piggy Products!

settings.title: Kavee Kare 101: All You Need to Know
settings.content: From the moment you bring them home over their first Gotcha Day to senior piggizen care - we’re with you every step of the way. Discover the secret life of your pigs with our blogs, written by pigsperts.

settings.title: Participate in Pig Parenting with Our Free Resources
settings.content: At Kavee, we think pet care resources should be free, so all piggy parents - new and experienced - can make their pigs’ lives the best it can be. Our printable resources make daily Kavee care fun for everybunny.

settings.title: DON’T FORGET TO JOIN THE KAVEE KOMMUNITY!
settings.content: You won’t want to miss our upcoming sales and latest products - just ask your pets. Stay in the know by signing up below!
